[{"id":"JT-38771","entityId":"25-1363281","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"38771"},{"name":"summary","value":"Large images do not fit the browser window"},{"name":"description","value":"
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create new issue and attach large image.
2. Click the image thumbnail to view it in full size.

What is the expected result?

The image should fit the window.

What happens instead?

The image does not fit the window, the close button is hidden under scrollbar. It seems the image size algorithm does take into account the scrollbars.

Example: IDEA-164193
Also please see the screenshot

JetBrains Bug & Issue Tracker YouTrack 7.0
Build 28357 [11-11-2016 13:20]
